languages.text: "А ты не можешь попросить Глейто сидеть смирно?"
"Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"
languages.original_text: "А ты не можешь попросить Глейто сидеть смирно?"

traits.locale_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"
"Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"
"Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"
"Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"
"Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"
"Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

languages.text: 「グライトに、少しの間おとなしく座っているように頼めないか？」
languages.original_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

traits.locale_text: 「グライトに、少しの間おとなしく座っているように頼めないか？」

languages.text: "Könntet Ihr Glaito bitten, einen Moment stillzusitzen?"
languages.original_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

traits.locale_text: "Könntet Ihr Glaito bitten, einen Moment stillzusitzen?"

languages.text: « Vous pouvez lui ordonner de rester immobile un instant ? »
languages.original_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez lui ordonner de rester immobile un instant ? »

languages.text: «¿No puede pedirle a Glaito que se esté quieto un momentito?».
languages.original_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No puede pedirle a Glaito que se esté quieto un momentito?».

languages.text: “你就不能让格雷托老老实实坐一会儿吗？”
languages.original_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

traits.locale_text: “你就不能让格雷托老老实实坐一会儿吗？”

languages.text: "Glaito'dan bir anlığına kımıldamadan durmasını isteyemez misin?"
languages.original_text: "Can't you ask Glaito to sit still for a moment?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'dan bir anlığına kımıldamadan durmasını isteyemez misin?"
